sentences.en: an impartial inquiry into the deaths
sentences.cn: 对死亡事件的公正调查

sentences.en: An impartial judge can settle our argument.
sentences.cn: 公正的仲裁人能解决我们的争端.

sentences.en: An impartial onlooker must be sought out.
As an impartial observer my analysis is supposed to be objective.
sentences.cn: 作为中立的观察员，我的分析应该客观。

sentences.en: Careers officers offer impartial advice to all pupils.
sentences.cn: 就业指导员向所有学生提供公正无私的建议。

sentences.en: He gave an impartial view of the state of affairs in Ireland.
sentences.cn: 他对爱尔兰的事态发表了公正的看法.

sentences.en: I shall be impartial, though I can not be neuter.
sentences.cn: 虽然我不能保持中立, 我也不偏袒任何一方.

sentences.en: Interpreting services shall always be competent, impartial and professional.
sentences.cn: 应保证翻译的质量,翻译要完整 、 公正和专业.

sentences.en: It can help to have an impartial third party look over your work.
sentences.cn: 让客观公正的第三方看一下你的成果会有助益。

sentences.en: Osmond asked in the tone of impartial curiosity.
sentences.cn: 奥斯蒙德发问,口气装得不偏不倚,难以理解似的.

sentences.en: Scientists, of course, can be expected to be impartial and disinterested.
sentences.cn: 当然，人们会认为科学家们理所当然是公正客观的。

sentences.en: The judge is impartial and selfless . He is trusted by people.
sentences.cn: 这位法官公正无私, 受到人们的信任.

sentences.en: Voir dire is a process designed to make sure jury is impartial.
sentences.cn: 设计陪审员''.'筛选'.''''.'程序'.''是为了确认陪审团是公正不偏倚的.

sentences.en: We must be able to stay impartial at all times.
sentences.cn: 我们必须经常保持公正的态度.

sentences.en: We offer impartial advice on tax and insurance.
sentences.cn: 我们就税收和保险问题提供公充的建议。

trans.tran_cn: 不偏不倚的，公平的，公正的，无私的，持平
trans.tran_en: not involved in a particular situation, and therefore able to give a fair opinion or piece of advice
